subject: info
description_text:
Hello, I was supposed to receive the package today but unfortunately I was not at home for an emergency. I would like to know if they will try again on Tuesday or if I have to cancel the order? In case they pass by, I am available after 1 pm, before that I am at work. In any case, I leave you my phone number 3495865118 so if they call me I will tell them where to leave it. I would like to have news by today or tomorrow at the latest.

The package tracking number is *934C00071694F*
Order Number # 407-9518134-4488348
let me know, thank you.

conversations.body_text: reply to me here I don't know how to use tickets
I already received the order thank you ?

Hi Salvo De Stradis,  Okay, I was just about to provide you with the local logistics contact. Once you receive the shipment, thatâ€™s fine. If you encounter any issues, feel free to contact us via email.
